attributes.title: Hail to the Dictator!
attributes.review:
I may be young, but that does not mean that I am uninformed. I was taught to always question, always seek more information, to embrace discussion from all sides in order to form my opinions. 
This app does NOT do that. They have taken a page from authoritarian history and are only publishing false and unsubstantiated propaganda. 
In this little bubble the world is a rosy white paradise that must be protected (with AK-47s). But in reality weâ€™re being slowly killed by a virus that has purposefully gone unchecked by this administration because it reflects badly on our narcissistic â€œLeaderâ€
How can good God fearing people support a candidate who has absolutely no regard for his fellow man?  This is NOT what Jesus would do. 
Use this app if you want  but PLEASE  use other sources as well. Stay informed by a diverse array of information. You owe it to yourself.

I ran inside screaming (with the pumpkin head in my hand still) and I realized that I didnâ€™t put his head down and I screamed even louder! I threw it as far as I could and (it hit my dog) but then it grew arms and legs and started chasing me saying â€œwhy didnâ€™t you rate me 5 stars? Rate me 5 NOW!!â€ But then luckily my dog went to the rescue and grabbed his head off me and ate it all up. Thank you Parker (my dog) for saving me from the terrifying pumpkin head.
